author: Special Correspondent
text: During the regular check of vehicles, the Election Commission officials have confiscated about Rs. 28 lakh, Chief Electoral Officer Rajesh Lakhoni said on Tuesday. While Rs. 23.70 lakh was confiscated from a person in Chennai, another Rs. 4.90 lakh was confiscated from a person in Gudalur, he added. In both the cases, the persons didn't have documents to show for why they were in possession of the cash.
title: Over Rs. 28 lakh confiscated by EC officials
